title: Hacker sighted
body:
So i played a game as Lux right, pretty normal?? It was until i saw the stats on the enemy Galio, 570 AP at 25 mins. 

like seriously had a Rabadons, Abyssal and an athene's with 15 from runes and another 15 from dorans

Passive = 70ap
Abyssal = 70ap
Rabadons recipe = 100ap
Athene's = 60ap
Runes and Dorans = 60
Answer = 360
35% of 360 = 0.35 x 360 = 126
310 + 126 = 436
570 - 436 = 134

I don't know how but this guy had an extra 134ap. Feel free to correct me but i don't believe that any math error that i did here makes up for the large 134ap margin. I don't know what tool or script or whatever bullshit he used but his items don't reflect the amount of damage and ability power he has.

1.2k ult
60% of 436 = 262
300 + 262 = 562
80% of 562 = 449
449 + 562 = 1011
30% of 1011 = 303
1011 - 303 = 708

an enormous difference of 500 damage

replies.body: no you have just failed to prove me wrong

galio ended up being level 15, so his base MR gives him max 24AP
MR from all his items, passive gives him  50AP
AP from his items without rabadons passive is 265AP
AP from runes and masteries at level 15 is 27AP

so far 366AP

at 25 minutes the enemy had 2 dragons. the 1st dragon gives 6% AD and AP, ill add that calculation later with rabadons
if at the time you observed his AP he had level 3 bulwark on, he gets 30AP
if at the time he also had blue buff from being level 15 max he gets 30AP at the time

add these flat values with 367 and its 426AP

now from the rabadons and the dragon buff, thats +36%AP of 426

=579AP, which means at the time of observation he either only had blue buff or only had bulwark
=570AP

> =579AP, which means at the time of observation he either only had blue buff or only had bulwark
> =570AP

1 he didnt have blue
2 he didnt have rabadons 
3 he didnt go for the scaling ap mastery
4 at the time of me observing he wasnt level 15
5 he had only 1 point in w at level 13 which is when i observed

> [{quoted}](name=xXAntiMatterXx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FGYgHPtN,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-02-11T04:51:17.771+0000)

> 2 he didnt have rabadons 
> 3 he didnt go for the scaling AP mastery
> 4 at the time of me observing he wasnt level 15
> 5 he had only 1 point in w at level 13 which is when i observed

sigh....i just....i just posted a flawless answer, how is there still confusion. i think you're being a bit stubborn now man. you didnt even account for dragon, whats more likely now that you're wrong again or that he is in fact hacking, AND my pinpoint calculations are wrong, AND you dont just want to see him punished for beating you or for whatever other reason

1 fine, ill humour you, he had bulwark on, its 4 seconds thats pretty long, and ill assume you specifically looked at buffs/debuffs and you saw there was no blue buff
2 he bought rabadons at exactly 25:41 im looking at it right now, did you know you can check after the game?
3 wrong, 15 scaling AP from the mastery, at the time he'd have 10/11 more AP, or 12.45 at level 15
4 well then my final answer would be off by a few AP but yours is off by over a hundred. ive taken into account more possibilities and i know literally every single thing else about that game and having not even been in the game i can still have a more reasonable and accurate answer
5 he had 2 points at level 13, normally this would feel like a smartass answer but tbh now it seems more like a better reason to point out your overexaggeration

in true internet fashion, im not surprised somebody will refuse to be proven wrong because its better suited for them to whinge for their own way. yeah im determined im right i just took over 10 minutes to write a detailed answer as to how he got such a highamount of AP and you refuse to believe me for whatever reason. the explanation included the possibilities of having 1 of either blue buff or bulwark on at the time you observed. i was convinced he would have blue buff as its much more likely, but i gave you the benefit of the doubt and you said he didnt have blue buff. thats fine though, ill dismiss this possible smartass-ery and i accounted for it, he had bulwark, its 4 seconds, gives the same amount of AP, thats fine, im still correct

but now, even after my pin-fucking-point calculations, you refuse to believe he didnt have rabadons, and you refuse to believe, that you did in fact observe him at 25:00 to 25:37 maximum, NO LATER, according to you, with only his bulwark on, having not yet bought rabadons until 25:41 (up to 4 seconds later) and with these stubborn conditions based on nothing but word of mouth to work, he must also be hacking, for the exact amount more of AP as if he were to just have had a rabadons, possibly 4 seconds later after you observed him......

yeah nah gtfo troll
did you forget about his passive you fucking shitter lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=Alfawarrior3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FGYgHPtN,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-02-11T06:24:48.028+0000)
>
> did you forget about his passive you fucking shitter lmao.

i factored in passive, w, items, runes masteries 
i didnt factor in blue because he didnt have blue, dragon because i didnt look at dragons, rabadons 35% because he didnt have rabadons
dragon give 6% extra ap and ad?? and blue buff gives ap also

are you factoring in bulwark which would be another 40 ap?

also rabadons is 120 ap not 100

So say he had 140 mr itd be

70
40 from bulwark mr
120 from death cap
60 from athenes
70 from abyssal
45 ap from runes
15 from dorans

That equals 420 raw ap

Which when you add 35% to it is 567

The remaining ap most likely came from masteries.

Not to mention if they had dragon buff and no ap from masteries and didnt use bulwark he would have 540 ap.

Which means yeah its very likely he was playing legit.

he didnt complete deathcap when i saw his ap as 570 so that is -20 + 35% ap.  He only completed rod and wand so thats 100ap + he only had 15 from runes and masteries doesn't give ap anymore and i did factor in bulwark. I factored in everything based on his stats at that point
There is actually ap from masteries, its only like 20 ap at level 18 though.
Report him via a support ticket. Doubt they will care. But you could try! :)
